alert.note: Alert for Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 4:56PM EDT until May 21 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Aroostook County in northern Maine... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 456 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Big Machias Lake, or 19 miles south of Deboullie Mountain, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Portage, Ashland, Portage Lake, Big Machias Lake, Russel Crossing, Nashville Plantation, Castle Hill, Wade, Garfield and Nashville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
